hero.title: Welcome to
hero.subtitle: CrudX is a powerful Spring Boot framework that automatically generates production-ready REST APIs with zero boilerplate code. Built for developers who value rapid development without sacrificing control or customization.

items.title: Zero Boilerplate
items.description: Eliminates 90% of repetitive CRUD code. Write entities and controllers — that's it!

items.title: Multi-Database
items.description: MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB support out of the box with auto-configuration.

items.title: Performance Analytics
items.description: Built-in real-time monitoring with response times, memory tracking, and endpoint stats.

items.title: Batch Operations
items.description: Bulk create/delete with skip-on-duplicate support and comprehensive tracking.

items.title: Auto-Pagination
items.description: Automatically switches to pagination for datasets over 1000 records.

items.title: Lifecycle Hooks
items.description: beforeCreate, afterUpdate, and other hooks for custom business logic.

items.title: Memory Optimized
items.description: Cursor-based streaming for large datasets prevents OutOfMemory errors.

items.title: Exception Handling
items.description: Built-in error handling with meaningful messages and proper HTTP status codes.

items.title: Transaction Support
items.description: Automatic transaction management with rollback on errors.

items.title: RESTful APIs
items.description: 10+ auto-generated REST endpoints following industry best practices.

items.title: In-Built Swagger UI
items.description: Integrated Swagger UI for instant API testing — no setup needed.
